en: The pupil was half asleep in class.
zh: 那个学生在课堂上昏昏欲睡。

en: The pupil held up his hand to ask a question.
zh: 那个学生举起手来提问。

en: That student sometimes affects illness.
zh: 那个学生有时会装病。

en: The student missed class three times in a row.
zh: 那个学生连续旷课三次。

en: The student has already solved all the problems.
zh: 那个学生已经解决了所有问题。

en: The pupil was punished for smoking.
zh: 那个小学生因为抽烟受到了惩罚。

en: The student was caught in the act of cheating.
zh: 那个学生作弊时被当场抓住了。

en: The student became very nervous with the teacher watching him.
zh: 老师看着他，那个学生变得非常紧张。

en: The student's progress is satisfactory.
zh: 那个学生的进步令人满意。

en: The students were told to turn in reports by the next day.
zh: 学生们被告知第二天要交报告。

en: All the students clapped their hands.
zh: 所有的学生都拍手鼓掌。

en: Some of the students played tennis, and the others played volleyball.
zh: 一些学生打网球，另一些学生打排球。

en: You had better see the cloth with your own eyes.
zh: 你最好亲眼看看这块布料。

en: In its home country of Germany, the hot dog was called the frankfurter.
zh: 在它的原产国德国，热狗被称为法兰克福香肠。

en: The stars shone all the time.
zh: 星星一直闪耀着。

en: The star is so bright as to be seen with the naked eye.
zh: 这颗星星非常明亮，肉眼可见。

en: The hair-dressing liquid gave off a strong smell.
zh: 那种美发液散发出强烈的气味。

en: The high-ranking government official ruled out the possibility of a general election.
zh: 那位高级政府官员排除了举行大选的可能性。

en: The government oppressed the people.
zh: 政府压迫人民。

en: The politician was not ashamed of having taken bribes.
zh: 那位政客对收受贿赂并不感到羞耻。

en: The politician had sticky fingers, and 5% of every contract ended in his pocket.
zh: 那位政客很贪婪，每份合同的5%最终都进了他的口袋。

en: The politician spoke with an important air.
zh: 那位政客说话时摆出一副重要的样子。

en: The statesman is worthy of respect.
zh: 那位政治家值得尊敬。

en: The politician had to take back his words and eat crow.
zh: 那位政客不得不收回他的话并承认错误。

en: The politician said he was deeply indebted to everyone for their support in the election.
zh: 那位政客说他非常感谢大家在选举中对他的支持。

en: The politician did not bother to apologize for betraying our trust.
zh: 那位政客懒得为背叛我们的信任而道歉。

en: The statesman seems to be concerned with the affair.
zh: 那位政治家似乎很关心这件事。

en: The wife and son of the statesman died three years ago.
zh: 那位政治家的妻子和儿子三年前去世了。

en: The politician first made a name for himself as an actor.
zh: 那位政客最初是作为一名演员而出名的。

en: The statesman is now in full vigor.
zh: 那位政治家现在正值壮年。

en: The politician lost his position in the end.
zh: 那位政客最终失去了他的职位。

en: That politician has been trafficking in drugs for years.
zh: 那位政客多年来一直在贩毒。

en: The politician claimed to oppose the conclusion.
zh: 那位政客声称反对这个结论。

en: The statesman barely coped with the intricate issue.
zh: 那位政治家勉强应付了那个复杂的问题。

en: The statesman comes from Arizona.
zh: 那位政治家来自亚利桑那州。

en: The name of this statesman is known to everybody in Japan.
zh: 这位政治家的名字在日本无人不知。

en: The statesman's death had a great impact on the political world.
zh: 那位政治家的去世对政治界产生了巨大的影响。

en: When the politician died, everybody hoped the son would follow in his father's footsteps.
zh: 当那位政客去世时，大家都希望他的儿子能继承他的衣钵。

en: The political scandal was brought to light by two journalists.
zh: 这起政治丑闻是由两名记者揭露的。

en: We have to conclude that the policy is a failure.
zh: 我们不得不得出结论，这项政策是失败的。

en: The policy will only accelerate inflation.
zh: 这项政策只会加速通货膨胀。

en: This policy resulted in a great rise in prices.
zh: 这项政策导致物价大幅上涨。

en: The success animated him with hope.
zh: 成功使他充满希望。

en: I'm not overly interested in the event.
zh: 我对这件事不太感兴趣。

en: The uniforms are different from those of our school.
zh: 这些制服和我们学校的不同。

en: I have no personal hostility to the system.
zh: 我对这个制度没有任何个人敌意。

en: All of us were not satisfied with the system.
zh: 我们并非所有人都对这个制度感到满意。

en: The opinion poll was based on a random sample of adults.
zh: 这次民意调查是基于对成年人的随机抽样。

en: The skit was presented by fifth grade students.
zh: 这个短剧是由五年级学生表演的。

en: The fork made its way to Western tables several hundred years later, but it was not immediately accepted.
zh: 叉子在几百年后才进入西方餐桌，但并没有立即被接受。

en: One king after another succeeded to the throne during those few years.
zh: 在那几年里，一位又一位国王继承了王位。

en: Those were the years when they were happiest.
zh: 那是他们最快乐的几年。

en: The figure indicates approximately two thirds of the freshmen are indifferent to politics.
zh: 这个数字表明大约三分之二的新生对政治漠不关心。

en: There seem to be few people who can solve that math problem.
zh: 似乎很少有人能解决那个数学问题。

en: Have you figured out the math problem yet?
zh: 你算出那道数学题了吗？

en: The math homework proved to be easier than I had expected.
zh: 数学作业比我想象的要容易。

en: Have you learned the number by heart?
zh: 你把号码背熟了吗？

en: The drunken man awoke to find himself in prison.
zh: 那个醉汉醒来发现自己身在监狱。

en: The drunken man couldn't walk straight.
zh: 那个醉汉走不稳路。

en: The drunkard had too much to drink; he has gone haywire.
zh: 那个酒鬼喝得太多了，他已经神志不清了。

en: The decline can be traced to the 1950s.
zh: 这种衰退可以追溯到20世纪50年代。

en: The swimming pool is used in common by all the children in the neighborhood.
zh: 这个游泳池是附近所有孩子共同使用的。

en: The water was fouled by oil.
zh: 水被油污染了。

en: The water runs downward to the pond.
zh: 水向下流到池塘里。

en: The water is not fit to drink.
zh: 这水不适合饮用。

en: The water will come to a boil in 5 minutes or so.
zh: 水大约会在5分钟左右沸腾。

en: The mystery contains more dialogue than narrative.
zh: 这个谜团包含的对话比叙述更多。

en: The figures are exactly alike.
zh: 这些数字完全一样。

en: The library has many books.
zh: 图书馆有很多书。

en: The library is now under construction.
zh: 图书馆现在正在建设中。

en: The library is eighty years old.
zh: 这座图书馆有八十年的历史了。

en: The chart illustrates how the body works.
zh: 这张图表说明了身体是如何运作的。

en: The anthropologist delivered a lecture on primitive cultures.
zh: 这位人类学家就原始文化发表了演讲。

en: They are both working at the pet store.
zh: 他们都在宠物店工作。

en: They should have bold ideas.
zh: 他们应该有大胆的想法。

en: The men were carrying the boy to the hospital.
zh: 那些人正把那个男孩抬到医院。

en: They should also be fair to others.
zh: 他们也应该对别人公平。

en: The people are playing baseball.
zh: 人们正在打棒球。

en: The people tried to clear the street of snow.
zh: 人们试图清除街道上的积雪。

en: The people don't like the birds.
zh: 人们不喜欢这些鸟。
